publishing_focus.primary_focus: Brain teasers, visual puzzles and logic games
publishing_focus.target_audience: Adult puzzle enthusiasts, brain trainers, and logic game lovers

publishing_focus.example_titles: Visual Logic Games by Renowned Puzzle Designer, Paul Sloane's Brain Teasers
